general_advisory: Farmers are advised to harvest rice crops which have reached 85% maturity...

advisory: PADDY - Flowering to Physiological maturity stage - BPH: Alter microclimate by alternate wetting and drying technique...
BLACK GRAM AND GREENGRAM - Pre sowing stage - Grow high yielding varieties like T 9, PU 11, PU 19 for black gram. Use Rhizobium culture.
BLACK GRAM AND GREENGRAM - Pre sowing stage - Grow high yielding varieties like K 851, PDM 11, OUM 115 for green gram. Use Rhizobium culture.
GROUNDNUT - Pre sowing stage - Use suitable varieties like Devi, TAG 37A. Treat seeds with Rhizobium culture.
BRINJAL AND TOMATO - Seedling stage - Manage wilt and rot disease with Plantomycin solution.
BRINJAL AND TOMATO - Seedling stage - Manage wilt and rot disease with Plantomycin solution.
CHILLI - Vegetative to Fruiting stage - Manage thrips infestation with blue sticky traps and chemical sprays.
MARIGOLD & ROSE - Vegetative to flowering stage - Manage Red Spider Mites with wettable sulphur or other sprays.
MARIGOLD & ROSE - Vegetative to flowering stage - Manage Red Spider Mites with wettable sulphur or other sprays.
FISHERIES - Various diseases may appear in fish during winters. Treat pond with CIFAX or limestone for protection.
